duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop, grow, and maintain diversified books of business in the property casualty insurance sector.
Assess risks, determine premiums, set conditions, and negotiate deals to maximize profitability.
Work closely with agents and brokers to manage accounts and pursue renewals.
Crunch numbers, review data, and identify opportunities for growth, profit, and diversification.
Maintain successful relationships with agents and brokers, while presenting proposals and obtaining approvals.
Mentor underwriters, share best practices, and contribute to team success.
Document account reviews, state-compliant sign-offs, and referrals in accordance with underwriting guidelines.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in a related field (Master’s preferred)
Chartered Property Casual Underwriter or other professional insurance designation preferred
